predicate.note: Frames file for 'zap' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: the one example
example.text: This is not only because it kills the unborn, a job at which it actually is not outstandingly efficient, *trace* zapping only 50% to 85% of them depending on which study you read (prostaglandin, taken in conjunction with the pill, boosts the rate to 95%).
